About Me

I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in creating web applications. My journey in software development started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet.

I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly applications using modern technologies like Angular, React, Node.js, and various cloud platforms.
